ProjectTitle: Real-time hybrid modelling of urban pluvial flood hazard maps using machine learning
InitialFeedbackHistory:
19/04/2024
Storage: storing data on laptops and external hard drives is not very secure, is there a specific reason not to use a KU Leuven storage solution with automatic backup? see https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en; for easy and secure file transfer you can use Globus: https://rdm-docs.icts.kuleuven.be/globus/index.html.  
Sharing: do you know already which repository you wil use? Have a look at our website for tips: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
